import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useFormik } from "formik"; function Auth() { // signup const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { name: "", email: "", password: "", }, onSubmit: (values) => { alert(JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)); }, }); // login return (
...
); } export default Auth;
